oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Springbok will lead people to a lion. Their knowledge of distant things gained by their fine scent. In the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain, from his parents (L V.-9. 4619-4651). Also, game knows the time of men's deaths, and as such their behaviour must be observed. The springbok tells people things if they understand its actions. 1) This story is found in Book V-9.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The springbok's story
